articles.author: Rohit
articles.title: Viral Video: 'South Asian' Pizza Delivery Worker Faces Racist Abuse In Toronto, Canada - News18
articles.description: Shocking video emerges of a Toronto pizza delivery worker facing racist abuse from a customer, sparking outrage online
articles.content:
A pizza delivery guy in Toronto, Canada was subjected to racist abuse by a customer over the payment method for the order, according to a viral video.
The spat apparently filmed by the rude customer… [+1946 chars]
